This website uses cookies. If that's okay with you, keep on browsing, or learn more about our .
Privacy Policy Close Cookie Disclosure Notice Pause Background Video 
Anything but common, Wild Common is Charleston’s wildly unique and unforgettable dining experience.

Set within one of Charleston’s most inspiring settings, Wild Common invites guests to experience a refined multi-course tasting menu by Executive Chef Orlando Pagán, a James Beard Award Semi-Finalist whose culinary artistry has earned the restaurant its first Michelin Star.

For diners seeking exceptional food and spirits, Wild Common celebrates  “all that is right, all that is good”, a nod to D.H. Lawrence’s poem of the same name. Come taste the uncommon.

a dining experience for the discerning epicurean

Dining Room, Interactive Chef’s Counter, and The Overlook Private Dining

Wild Common is ideal for intimate dining and memorable celebrations. The Overlook is an opportunity to savor elevated fare, interact with the chef and be wowed by a curated multi-course culinary experience. Dining in the restaurant, you’ll find a similar exceptional multi- course tasting menu and engaging conviviality. Around the table or at the interactive Chef’s Counter, Executive Chef Orlando Pagán and team deliver Charleston’s premier dining adventure.
Book your Wild Common reservation on Resy 
Anything but common fare, wildly welcoming hospitality

You’ve got a lot on your plate day-to-day, that’s why our plates come to you full of extraordinary flavors, without you having to do anything but show up. No deciding, no stress, just sit back and be wildly indulged by unparalleled food and personal service. Add wine pairings with both our culinary experiences to take your uncommon meal to an unreal level.
View Menu Sample 
Gift Cards

Give the gift of culinary excellence! If you haven’t experienced our wildly intimate dinners, we encourage you to join us this season.
Purchase a gift card Opens in a new window. 
Private Dining

Treat yourself and up to 12 guests to a private dining experience on our Mezzanine overlooking the courtyard and main dining room.
Learn more Opens in a new window. 
Chef's Counter

The Chef’s Counter is your front row seat into the Wild Common culinary journey. Join us for an interactive and upfront seat to all the action.
Book Your Reservation Opens in a new window. 
2024 Series

Charleston Artist Collective Partnership

To complement our kitchen’s innovative spirit, Wild Common’s dining room and ambiance have always been art-infused. In partnership with Charleston Artist Collective, we are proud to feature local Lowcountry artists on our menus and we’re thrilled to launch the latest series. Allow us to introduce you to these talented artists below and be sure to book your reservation to experience their incredible work in person.
Meet the Artists Opens in a new window. 
Condé Nast Traveler

40 Best Restaurants in Charleston

Wild Common has been named one of Charleston’s 40 Best Restaurants by Condé Nast Traveler. Experience our chef driven tasting journey, from local seafood to luxurious touches like caviar, black truffle and foie gras, all prepared in our open kitchen for a truly unforgettable culinary adventure.
Read the article Opens in a new window. 
Michelin Guide

Wild Common has earned One MICHELIN Star

Chef Orlando Pagán’s tasting menu is far from common, and while upgrades like caviar eggs Benedict and wagyu are indeed available, there’s nothing standard here.
Read the article Opens in a new window. 
Eater Carolinas

7 Top Tasting Menu Restaurants in Charleston

Spring Street’s Wild Common is a tasting menu restaurant for people who don’t normally like tasting menus. It’s not stuffy or pretentious, but rather a chill atmosphere full of light installations, art, and vegetation.
Read the article Opens in a new window. Follow us on Instagram. @wildcommonchs - Link opens in a new tab 
Let's get social.
Book Reservation

Private Events

Wild Common and Cannon Green have gained a reputation as the premier destination for hosting the most unique events in downtown Charleston.

Artisan Catering included with every event

Wild Common offers private dining for small groups and individuals in a space intimately tucked within the broader environs of Cannon Green, one of Charleston’s most celebrated and versatile event venues. To us, hospitality means welcoming and accommodating a variety of needs and desires–that’s why we’ve got options for groups of all sizes. And not just options. Wildly feasible solutions and dreamy scenarios.

Menu
Tasting Menu No. 715 Sample Menu 
In an effort to honor Chef Orlando Pagán’s vision, Wild Common strives to make as few changes to the menu as possible and is unable to accommodate certain dietary restrictions (gluten, vegan, dairy, soy, fin fish allergies).

Steamboat Creek Oyster

Chicken Wing

Pho

Dogpatch Farm Harvest

Carrot Caramelle, Pine Nuts, Vadouvan

Optional - "Eggs Benedict"

Regiis Ova Osetra Caviar, English Muffin, Hollandaise

Seared Hokkaido Scallop

Chanterelle Mushroom, Seafood Tartlet, Lobster Nage

Charleston Gold Rice Sourdough

Nutritional Yeast Butter

Dry-Aged New York Strip

Pomme Puree, Bok Choi, Bourbon-Truffle Jus

Optional - Margaret River Gold Medal Australian Wagyu

Dark Chocolate Torte

Honey, Peanut, Black Truffle Ice Cream

Tasting Menu $95

We permit a maximum of two bottles per table, with each bottle limited to 750ml. Magnums are considered equivalent to two bottles. Our corkage fee is $45 per bottle. We kindly request that the selected bottle is not currently listed on our wine list.

Privacy Policy Close Cookie Disclosure Notice 
Restaurant

The Experience

Each reservation offers an innovative, chef-driven tasting menu with unique and uncommon flavors and presentations. While the menu changes regularly to reflect seasonality and the freshest ingredients, Wild Common pulls inspiration from cuisines across the globe and features dishes with regionally sourced ingredients. Savor our wildly exciting multi-course Tasting Menu. Wine pairings are available, as is wine by the bottle and a full cocktail menu.

Parties of 6-12 can join us at Wild Common’s private dining experience,  .
The Overlook Book Your Table Opens in a new window. View the Sample Menu Opens in a new window.
